Articles.Content:
I would like to make a suggestion/request regarding KerbalEdu.. Ive seen some screenshots from the educational version of KSP and wondered if the GUI that is used for it could be installed to regular KSP as an alternate interface? I really liked the look and feel of it and thought it would be great for people that are just new to the game as I noticed the information panel that shows you what parts are required and what you actually have set up.

Im not suggesting that the EDU version replace the current gui.. but offer it as an alternate.. I personally would really like to use it.
